publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4056 Dr Richard Simpson: Congratulations to Alloa RFC—That the Parliament congratulates Alloa Rugby Football Club, its players, coaches, committee and supporters on winning the hard-fought Caledonia league championship and expresses the hope that all the development work being done in Clackmannanshire for sport, including rugby, will lead to further successes in the future.
S3M-4056 Congratulations to Alloa RFC (lodged on 5 May 2009) Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-4056 Dr Richard Simpson: Congratulations to Alloa RFC—That the Parliament congratulates Alloa Rugby Football Club, its players, coaches, committee and supporters on winning the hard-fought Caledonia league championship and expresses the hope that all the development work being done in Clackmannanshire for sport, including rugby, will lead to further successes in the future. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn
